text: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That! is a Canadian/British/American TV show. It airs on PBS Kids. It first aired on September 6, 2010 in the United States. It aired its final episode on October 14, 2018. It is based on the The Cat in the Hat books. == References == Category:PBS Kids shows Category:2010 American television series debuts Category:2018 American television series endings Category:2010 Canadian television series debuts Category:2018 Canadian television series endings Category:English-language television programs
title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That
